title: Magic butterfly net

properties.name: description
properties.value: A  magic butterfly net is an item used in the Hunter skill. It is wielded to capture butterflies, and implings throughout Gielinor and Puro-Puro, and bats in the Chambers of Xeric. A player must have a Hunter level of 17 in order to wield a magic butterfly net. Where relevant, in order to make use of the net, butterfly jars and impling jars are also needed.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Magic butterfly net
Magic butterfly net

Advanced data
Item ID11259

A magic butterfly net is an item used in the Hunter skill. It is wielded to capture butterflies, and implings throughout Gielinor and Puro-Puro, and bats in the Chambers of Xeric. A player must have a Hunter level of 17 in order to wield a magic butterfly net. Where relevant, in order to make use of the net, butterfly jars and impling jars are also needed.

The magic butterfly net can perform the same actions as an ordinary butterfly net, however the magic butterfly net increases the player's chances of capturing butterflies, implings, and bats[1] by about 7.8% (20/256).[2]

Players can right-click this net to open the Impling Tracker, which tracks how many implings they've caught both in Puro-Puro and the surface world.

A magic butterfly net can be obtained by trading Elnock Inquisitor the following impling jars:

  • 3 gourmet impling jars
  • 2 earth impling jars
  • 1 essence impling jar

Warning: This item is always lost on death, even if it would otherwise be one of the player's items kept on death. Should this happen, the player will need to obtain another.

[[File:Magic butterfly net detail.png|left|150px]]
A ''' magic butterfly net''' is an item used in the [[Hunter]] skill. It is wielded to capture [[butterfly (Hunter)|butterflies]], and [[impling]]s throughout [[Gielinor]] and [[Puro-Puro]], and bats in the [[Chambers of Xeric]]. A player must have a Hunter level of 17 in order to wield a magic butterfly net. Where relevant, in order to make use of the net, [[butterfly jar]]s and [[impling jar]]s are also needed.

The magic butterfly net can perform the same actions as an ordinary [[butterfly net]], however the magic butterfly net increases the player's chances of capturing butterflies, implings, and bats{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/974667806884139008|date=16 March 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/lH6sb|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=It does.}} by about 7.8% <sup>(20/256)</sup>.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/859430281404702720|date=2 May 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/LlqRx|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=Adds about 7.8% to your chance.}}

Players can right-click this net to open the [[Impling Tracker]], which tracks how many implings they've caught both in Puro-Puro and the surface world.

A magic butterfly net can be obtained by trading [[Elnock Inquisitor]] the following impling jars:
*3 [[gourmet impling jar]]s
*2 [[earth impling jar]]s
*1 [[essence impling jar]]

'''Warning''': This item is always lost on death, even if it would otherwise be one of the player's items kept on death. Should this happen, the player will need to obtain another.
